response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which we believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its value to be well above $1,200,000. Considering the exceptional benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,500,000. This opportunity is tailored to ensure that you receive unparalleled value while also securing a competitive advantage in your field. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or explore any customization options that might better align with your specific needs. We look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this innovative solution to your organization.", "product_price": 1500000}
